name: KLM Full Flight | Amsterdam to London Heathrow | Fokker 70 **With ATC**
description:
A full length, real time full flight video onboard KLM Fokker 70 PH-KZE operating flight KL1023 from Amsterdam Schiphol to London Heathrow on January 30 2016.

**Every minute of the flight included from terminal to terminal, as well as ATC for the full flight**

Our flight begins with a bus ride out to the KLM Cityhopper ramp at Amsterdam's Schiphol airport, before we board and take our seat in seat 15A.  We receive our departure clearance before getting clearance to start, and taxi out to runway 24 (Kaagbaan) at Schiphol.  We blast off into a beautiful sunset, rocketing out of Schiphol towards FL240.

As we cross the North Sea we hand over to London ATC, and commence our approach over London as the sun starts to set.  We line up for a landing on runway 27L, and touchdown ahead of schedule before taxying into Heathrow's Terminal 4.  We deboard and have a long wait for immigration before we exit Terminal 4 on a cold January evening.

Airline:  KLM Cityhopper
Flight:  KL1023
Aircraft:  Fokker 70 PH-KZE
From:  Amsterdam Schiphol (AMS)
To:  London Heathrow (LHR)
Departure:  16:59
Arrival:  16:55
Flight Time:  00:56
Seat:  15A
Flight Path: http://goo.gl/ipCIgD

Filmed from seat 15A.
